title: Roosevelt Campobello International Park: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets       Pets may not be left unattended and must be on a six-foot leash at all times. Pets are permitted on park grounds, but not in park buildings or shelters (except for service dogs or sight-guiding dogs). For more information about taking your pet across the border, visit the following websites: U.S. Customs and Border Protection Travelling with Dogs in Canada- CFIA
